activityIdeas.title: Activity Ideas
activityIdeas.description: A link to ideas for using a product or engaging in other forms of entertainment, particularly with children.

allergenInfo.title: Allergen information
allergenInfo.description: A link to a description of the allergen information.

appDownload.title: App download
appDownload.description: A link to a related mobile app

backgroundInfo.title: Background Information
backgroundInfo.description: A link to information typically from the owner of the identified entity about the creative background, thought leadership or influence of the identified entity. This may include the inspiration, innovation for a development process, literary approach or, the science or technology used.

brandHomepageClinical.title: Information for professionals about this brand
brandHomepageClinical.description: A link to a brand presence aimed at clinical professionals.

brandHomepagePatient.title: Information for patients about this brand
brandHomepagePatient.description: A link to a brand presence aimed at patients.

careersInfo.title: Careers information
careersInfo.description: A link to information about jobs, careers, or other employment opportunities associated to an organisation or location.

consumerHandlingStorageInfo.title: Consumer handling and storage information
consumerHandlingStorageInfo.description: A link to information about safe handling and storage for consumer use.

defaultLink.title: Default link
defaultLink.description: The default link for a given identified item to which a resolver will redirect unless there is information in the request that is a better match.

defaultLinkMulti.title: Default linkMulti
defaultLinkMulti.description: A set of 'default links' that may be differentiated by information in the HTTP request headers sent to a resolver to enable a better match than the single default link.

dpp.title: Digital Product Passport
dpp.description: A link to a digital product passport.

eifu.title: Electronic Instructions For Use
eifu.description: A link to electronic Instruction For Use instructions for Medical Devices.

epcis.title: EPC Information Services (EPCIS) repository
epcis.description: A link to an EPCIS repository of visibility event data.

epil.title: Electronic Patient Information Leaflet
epil.description: A link to an electronic patient information leaflet.

eventsInfo.title: Events information
eventsInfo.description: A link to event details.  For a page specifically for scheduling a reservation or booking an appointment, see gs1:scheduleTime.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: A link to a set of frequently asked questions.

handledBy.title: Handled by
handledBy.description: Used when one resolver redirects all request URIs that match a given pattern without further processing, such as from GS1 to a brand-operated service. See section 7.7.1 of the Digital Link standard, version 1.1.

hasRetailers.title: Has Retailers
hasRetailers.description: A link to a list of retailers.

homepage.title: Organisation Information Page
homepage.description: A link to general information about an organisation or brand. Typically the homepage of an organisation's website. It may include links to further information such as certifications, careers, payments, reservations, etc.

ingredientsInfo.title: Ingredients information
ingredientsInfo.description: A link to facts about ingredients.

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: A link to instructions, such as assembly instructions, usage tips etc.  It is not appropriate to use this link type for healthcare regulated content applications for which specific link types are available.

jws.title: JSON Web Signature
jws.description: A link to a JSON Web Signature

leaveReview.title: Leave a review
leaveReview.description: A link through which a review can be added.

locationInfo.title: Location information
locationInfo.description: A link to a map, directions, or other location-related information.  For B2B location  information, see gs1:logisticsInfo.  For details specific to hours of operation, see gs1:openingHoursInfo

logisticsInfo.title: Logistics information
logisticsInfo.description: A link to B2B logistics information related to a physical location.

loyaltyProgram.title: Loyalty program
loyaltyProgram.description: A link to information about a loyalty program, including a member's current status and/or a registration option for new members

masterData.title: Master data
masterData.description: A link to a source of structured master data for the entity. This is typically for B2B applications.

menuInfo.title: Menu information
menuInfo.description: A link to menu details. This may include food menus, services, or other offerings provided by an organisation or at a location.  For details specific to allergens only, see gs1:allergenInfo .  For details specific to nutrition information only, see gs1:nutritionalInfo .  For details specific to ingredients only, see gs1:ingredientsInfo .

openingHoursInfo.title: Opening hours information
openingHoursInfo.description: A link to details on hours of operation.

paymentLink.title: Make Payment
paymentLink.description: A link to a place where payments details are provided and/or payments can be made by the user.

pip.title: Product Information Page
pip.description: A link to information specifically about the identified item, typically operated by the brand owner or a retailer of the product and aimed at consumers. It may include links to further information, product description, specifications etc.

productSustainabilityInfo.title: Sustainability and recycling (deprecated)
productSustainabilityInfo.description: This term has been deprecated. Please use gs1:sustainabilityInfo instead.

purchaseSuppliesOrAccessories.title: Purchase supplies or accessories
purchaseSuppliesOrAccessories.description: A link to information about where supplies or accessories for the item can be purchased or ordered.

quickStartGuide.title: Quick start guide
quickStartGuide.description: A link to a description of the key features needed to be understood to begin using the item or interacting with something new.

recallStatus.title: Recall status
recallStatus.description: A link to information about whether the product has been recalled or not, typically an API.

recipeInfo.title: Recipe website
recipeInfo.description: A link to a recipe website.

registerProduct.title: Register purchase
registerProduct.description: A link to an entry point for registering ownership of a product including for warranty purposes.

registryEntry.title: Entry in a register
registryEntry.description: A link to an entry in a register, such as a business register or register of locations. Such registers may act as alternative identifiers, such as official company numbers, LEIs, other location identifiers etc.

relatedImage.title: Related image
relatedImage.description: A link to any image that depicts or relates to the identified entity (e.g., trade item, assets, business process, patient record, location, organisation, etc.)

relatedVideo.title: Related  video
relatedVideo.description: A link to any video, or document that has an embedded video, that describes or relates to the identified item, organisation, or location in some way.

reportFound.title: Report found
reportFound.description: A link to a platform or service where users (company or a person) can report a found item associated with the identified entity (instance of an item). This link type is designed to assist in connecting the found item with its rightful owner or relevant authorities.

scheduleTime.title: Scheduling/Reservation
scheduleTime.description: A link to a site that offers information on scheduling, appointments, or reservations. This may or may not allow the user to book the reservation.

serviceInfo.title: Service information
serviceInfo.description: A link to service or maintenance instructions.

smartLabel.title: SmartLabel
smartLabel.description: A link to the product's SmartLabel page.

smpc.title: Summary Product Characteristics (SmPC)
smpc.description: A link to Summary Product Characteristics. To be used specifically when linking to information for healthcare professionals.

socialMedia.title: Social media
socialMedia.description: A link to a social media channel. The title will typically be replaced by the name of the channel.

statisticInfo.title: Statistics
statisticInfo.description: A link to information about statistics regarding an organisation, location, or other entity.

subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: A link to a subscription form

support.title: Support
support.description: A link to a source of support such as a helpdesk, chat support, email etc.

sustainabilityInfo.title: Sustainability and recycling
sustainabilityInfo.description: A link to information relating to sustainability and recycling requirements or processes.

traceability.title: Traceability information
traceability.description: A link to traceability information (includes track and trace).  Traceability information may be provided for consumption by humans or computers. If the target is an EPCIS repository, use gs1:epcis instead.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.description: A link to a tutorial or set of tutorials, such as online classes, how-to videos etc.

userAgreement.title: Sign waiver/agreement/document
userAgreement.description: A link to an agreement or waiver.

verificationService.title: Verification Service
verificationService.description: A link to a GS1 Lightweight Messaging Service for verifying the status of a product, organisation, or location and its identifier.

whatsInTheBox.title: What's in the box?
whatsInTheBox.description: A link to a description of all the individual items in a packaged item.
